I am wanting the government to change the laws of organ donar registers to make is mandatory that everyone goes on the organ donar transplant list , with option to remove them selfs if they don't want to be in the list.
I want the government to publicise the need for more organ donors and less wastage of organs on the nhs so more people get a chance of life , and that everyone gets accepted onto the list. All people need is a chance of hope.

A friends son is only 16 months old and might need  a double lung transplant due to his lungs are 80% damaged , there is no guarantee he will be accepted onto the list which we think is unacceptable , the law needs changing to allow hope for all patients.
